name: GuesstheAnimalAnimalSoundsGame
0:
”Alexa, open animal game.”
”Alexa, launch animal game.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This animal game is all about fun. Can you guess what the cat sounds in Japanese language? How does the mouse squeak to a Swedish ear? Find it out right away! Play a guessing game with Alexa and discover both livestock and wild animals in entertaining skill.

Oddly enough, nature sounds differently across the globe. People of various nations have seem to hear barking and chirping in their own way. In this game for kids and adults you are to guess the animal by the sound Alexa makes. It will also give you a few clues to prompt the correct answer.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
